direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods extract values from JSON objects based on a key, but pullValue also removes the key from the object.
Both methods extract values from JSON objects based on a key, but pullValue also removes the key from the object.
Both methods manipulate JSON objects by adding or removing key-value pairs, sharing similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods interact with JSON objects, though sortJSONObject focuses on sorting keys rather than extracting or removing them.
Both methods depend on JSON objects and handle exceptions similarly, though buildJSONString constructs a new JSON string.
